pr_title: [FLINK-17635][docs][table sql / api] Add documentation about view support

timeline.message: [FLINK-17635][docs][table sql / api] Add documentation about view support

timeline.bodyText: move this section to the front of IF EXISTS
timeline.author: godfreyhe
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -143,6 +144,22 @@ Dropping a non-empty database triggers an exception. Enabled by default.
 
 Dropping a non-empty database also drops all associated tables and functions.
 
+## DROP VIEW
+
+{% highlight sql %}
+DROP [TEMPORARY] VIEW  [ IF EXISTS ] view_name
+{% endhighlight %}
+
+Drop a view that has catalog and database namespaces. If the view to drop does not exist, an exception is thrown.
+
+**IF EXISTS**
+
+If the view does not exist, nothing happens.
+
+**TEMPORARY**

timeline.author: godfreyhe
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -143,6 +144,22 @@ DROP DATABASE [IF EXISTS] [catalog_name.]db_name [ (RESTRICT | CASCADE) ]
 
 删除一个非空数据库时，把相关联的表与函数一并删除。
 
+## DROP VIEW
+
+{% highlight sql %}
+DROP [TEMPORARY] VIEW  [ IF EXISTS ] view_name
+{% endhighlight %}
+
+删除一个有 catalog 和数据库命名空间的视图。若需要删除的视图不存在，则会产生异常。
+
+**IF EXISTS**
+
+若视图不存在，则不会进行任何操作。
+
+**TEMPORARY**
